name: Cool Adventure Funkin
description:
Cool Adventure Funkin' is a small personal project I decided to release to the public once I finish it! In this mod, you play as Kotaro with her "hat" Hugh, alongside her girlfriend Tokaro, who is somehow a sentient being of paint?
Week 1- Features Tokaro's father/creator, Leo
Week 2- Features the party members Skelton and Skeleford, brothers.
Week 3- Features Retarded Snake, a nuiscence to the party..
Week 4- Features Belinda, Kotaro and Rose's mother. And Rose being in place for GF.
Week 5- Features the party members (and lovers) Hjero and Annie, along with Skeleman (Retarded Snake's best friend)
Week 6- Features the party member Sir Prince Prince, Prince of Princes. Along with Veronica, Leo's little sister
Bonus Week- Features Hjero yet again for a rematch with Kotaro. (And 1 custom song replacing Lo-Fight)
